resources.string:
" To calculate alarm: type it into red rectangle and confirm. Result will be shown in an orange rectangle. It assumes that bitExtended is set to "false". Supports alarms starting with 5_, 60, 70. Report problems, bugs and suggestion with \"Bug\" button.
Like this app? Rate it on Playstore. Support me with \"Buy me a coffee\" button :) Thanks for testing. Have a nice day at work! danex11"
Choose an Email client to report bugs and observations:
